text: Georges-Alain Vuille (1948–99) was a Swiss film producer. In the late 1970s he tried to finance a film version of the James Clavell novel Tai-Pan. ==Filmography== *Ashanti (1979) - producer *Womanlight (1979) - producer *The Favorite (1989) - producer ==References== ==External links== * Category:Swiss film producers
title: Georges-Alain Vuille
